overview:
Having 23 years of experience in the fabrication industry, Jay Brahmani Fabricators & Engineers specialized in offering a precision engineered range of Machinery Parts, Hydraulic Presses, Press Brakes, Hoist Crane Machinery Parts, Conventional Hydraulic Press Brakes, NC Hydraulic Press Brakes and Hydraulic Shearing Presses. Along with these, our professionals also engaged in supplying Special Purpose Presses, Various Machinery Parts, Precision Sheet Metal Fabrications and Plate & Section Fabrications.

Leveraging on our diligent workforce and state-of-the-art infrastructure facility, we are able to fabricate a range, which is at par with the latest industry standards. In order to ensure that a defect free and flawless range is dispatched to the clients, our team of quality controllers rigorously tests the components on several quality parameters. With efforts like these, we are able to cater to the varied requirements of our clients, within the estimated time frame.
